AI Description: CFFI is a Foreign Function Interface between Python and C. It allows calling C code from Python and using Python code from C. It provides a way to interact with foreign functions and call them from Python without having to write any C code.
Core Features: Easily Call C Functions From Python, Efficiently Share Data Between C & Python, No Need To Write C Code With The Use Of Cffi Apis
General Tags: Foreign Function Interface, C Library Integration, Python
